SEint Seint
Iulian þe confe&slong;&slong;our &punctelev; wa&slong; ibo&rrot;e at rome Rome
Uita sc&combtilde;i sancti Iuliani &condes;&combisbelow;f&combcurl; confessoris
Muche muche folk þo&rrot;u&yogh; is p&rrot;echingue&punctelev;cri&slong;tine heo bicome
Of noble kunne he wa&slong; icome&punctelev;and renable he wa&slong; inou&yogh;
After þe Apo&slong;tle&slong; he cam &slong;one&punctelev;and muche folk to guode d&rrot;o&yogh;
Into a cite he was i&slong;ent&punctelev;þe p&rrot;echour guod and trewe
A&slong;e apo&slong;tel fo&rrot; to p&rrot;echi&punctelev;þe &yogh;wile cri&slong;tinedom wa&slong; newe
Cri&slong;tinedom wa&slong; þo vnwurþe&punctelev;in þulke cite þere
gret &slong;co&rrot;n heo hadden of alle þulke&punctelev;þat icri&slong;tnede were
And alle þat &slong;peken of cri&slong;tinedom&punctelev;heo defouleden heom inou&yogh;
In Aunter aunter him dude þis holie man&punctelev;and þuderward &yogh;u&ydot;t him d&rrot;ou&yogh;
And among heom he cam wel mildeliche&punctelev;and p&rrot;echede fa&slong;te anon
Þat folk d&rrot;of to bu&slong;emare&punctelev;þe me&slong;te del echon
Ake o&rrot;e louerd &slong;ende him grace&punctelev;and fair miracle fo&rrot; him wrou&yogh;te
And þat folk þo&rrot;u&yogh; is p&rrot;echingue&punctelev;to cri&slong;tinedom he b&rrot;ou&yogh;te
Ore louerd him &yogh;af so fair grace&punctelev;þat with one wo&rrot;de he mi&yogh;te
helen Meo&slong;ele&slong; meoseles and guidie Men men
&punctelev;and þe blinde &yogh;iuen heo&rrot;e &slong;i&yogh;t
Þa&rrot;e na&slong; no manere vuel&punctelev;nou&yogh;wer þare he cam gon
Þo&rrot;u&yogh; þe vertue of þe croiz&punctelev;þat he ne helde heom anon
So þat he to&rrot;nede to cri&slong;tinedom Cristinedom &punctelev;al þat folk þare a boute
And &slong;iweden him al&slong;o in to Al al þat lond&punctelev;of heom wel grete route
So þat heo comen in one &slong;tude&punctelev;a þur&slong;t heo weren wel &slong;o&rrot;e
heo nu&slong;ten &yogh;ware to d&rrot;inke come&punctelev;it greuede heom ful &slong;o&rrot;e
heo criden alle on >&slong;eint Iulian&punctelev;þat he &slong;um d&rrot;inke heom founde
Þi&slong; holie man nam op is &slong;taf&punctelev;smot doun into þe grounde
And pi&yogh;te þane po&ydot;nt a lu&ydot;te in þe eo&rrot;þe&punctelev;þare cam walle out anon
Þet be&slong;te water þat mi&yogh;te beo&punctelev;among heom euerechon
And fond heom alle d&rrot;inke inou&yogh;&punctelev;þare neuer er welle na&slong;
Þo&rrot;u&yogh; vertue of þis holie man&punctelev;fair miracle þare was
So mani fair Miracle miracle o&rrot;e louerd dude&punctelev;fo&rrot; loue of &slong;eint Iulian
Þat muche del of þat folk&punctelev;heolden him a god a no man
In gode&slong; Godes &slong;erui&slong;se ate la&slong;te&punctelev;his lijf he b&rrot;ou&yogh;te to ende
And a lu&ydot;te bifo&rrot;e candel ma&slong;&slong;e&punctelev;to heouene he gan iwende
In þe latere ende of Ieneuer&punctelev;þis confe&slong;&slong;our &slong;o hende
Nou god God fo&rrot; is &slong;wete loue&punctelev;u&slong; þudere alle &slong;ende
An oþur &slong;eint Iulian þare is&punctelev;þat men biddeth welfa&slong;te
After guod ·In· Iulian in onecouth &slong;tude&punctelev;&yogh;wane heo beoth &slong;o&rrot;e a ga&slong;te
SEint Seint
Iulianþe guode herebeger&punctelev;of noble ku&ydot;nde com Uita sc&combtilde;i sancti Iuliani
boni ho&slong;pit&er; hospitis
&slong;talewarde and &slong;trong man he was&punctelev;and louede wel cri&slong;tindom boni ho&slong;pit&er; hospitis
·
he louede al&slong;o game inou&yogh;&punctelev;Of haueke&slong; and of hounde&slong;
Anoblere bodi þane he wa&slong;&punctelev;nnou&yogh;were na&slong; non ifounde
A&slong;e he hountede In in a dai&punctelev;
In in n Iolifte iolifte jnou&yogh;
A&slong;w&ydot;þe fair heo&rrot;t hei&slong;ai&yogh;&punctelev;and þareafter fa&slong;te he d&rrot;ou&yogh;
he &slong;trencþede him to nime þat be&slong;t&punctelev;and &slong;iwede after fa&slong;te
Þo þis heo&rrot;t hadde longe Io&rrot;ne &punctelev;he biturnde him ate la&slong;te
And &slong;pak with him a&slong;e god God it wolde&punctelev;Iulian he &slong;ede
&YOGH;wi &slong;iwe&slong;te me &slong;o fa&slong;te he &slong;eide&punctelev;þou &slong;chalt don anoþur dede
boþe þi fader and þi moder &punctelev; þou &slong;chalt &yogh;eot aquelle
Ake ne beo þou noþe wroþure with me&punctelev;þei ich it þe telle
Þo þis guode man þis iheo&rrot;de&punctelev;him bigan wond&rrot;i and d&rrot;ede
Fo&rrot; þat wilde be&slong;t &slong;o &slong;pack&punctelev;and fo&rrot; wo&rrot;de&slong; þat he &slong;ede
him wond&rrot;ede a&slong;e him mi&yogh;te wel&punctelev;fo&rrot; it &slong;pak a&yogh;ein ku&ydot;nde
he wa&slong; aferd fo&rrot; he him bihec&punctelev;and ofte it hadde in mu&ydot;nde
Þat he &slong;cholde fader and moder sle&punctelev;And to fleo þat dede
he wende out of contreie &slong;tilledliche&punctelev; a&slong;e god God him wolde lede
Into feo&rrot;rene contreie he wende&punctelev;so þat he cam bi cas
to a gret p&rrot;ince of alond&punctelev;and in &slong;eruice wiz him wa&slong;
So wel he paide is louerd in Arme&slong; armes
&punctelev;and in alle oþur dede&slong;
Þat he made him mai&slong;ter of is ferd&punctelev;al fo&rrot;to gwie and lede
And &slong;ethþe he made him
wijf&punctelev; riche and noble al&slong;o
Alauedi of a gret contreie&punctelev;and of grete mo&rrot;u&yogh;iue al&slong;o
bitwene him and is guode lauedie&punctelev;loue þare wa&slong; inov&yogh;
Fo&rrot; to alle guodne&slong;&slong; bi heo&rrot;e mi&yogh;te&punctelev;e&ydot;þur to oþur d&rrot;ou&yogh;
Ake is guode fader and is Moder moder
&punctelev;þat he bilefte him atom bihinde
Sw&ydot;þe &slong;orie weren fo&rrot; heo&rrot;e &slong;one &punctelev;þat heo ne mi&yogh;ten him nou&yogh;wer finde
heo wenden fo&rrot;th in at&ydot;me boþe&punctelev;and &slong;ou&yogh;ten him wel wide
Fram o contreie to oþur fa&slong;te&punctelev;aboute in eche &slong;ide
So þat heo iheo&rrot;den of him tellen&punctelev; þei it were longue
to is ca&slong;tel hu&ydot; d&rrot;owen heom anon&punctelev;and faire weren onderfongue
heo ne founden nou&yogh;t him&slong;eof athom&punctelev;ake is wijf heo wa&slong; þere
Fair semblaunt heo made heom&punctelev;þo heo wu&slong;te &yogh;wat heo were
heo honourede heom þe mo&rrot;e&punctelev;for hire louerd ne wa&slong; nou&yogh;t þare
And leide heom in heo&rrot;e owene bed&punctelev;and hire&slong;eolf la&ydot; elles&yogh;ware
Amo&rrot;ewe are hit were dai&punctelev;heo aros op wel &slong;ofte
And to churche &yogh;eode wel &slong;tilleliche&punctelev;a&slong;e heo wa&slong; iwoned ofte
Þo cam hire louerd hom&punctelev;In þe mo&rrot;eweningue &slong;one
And d&rrot;ou&yogh; him to chaumb&rrot;e toward is bed&punctelev;a&slong;e he wa&slong; iwoned to done
Þo iheo&rrot;de he wel &slong;ofte slepe&punctelev;and swei&yogh;en þa&rsup;inne tweie
A&slong;e Men men and wommen nede moten&punctelev;þat beoth werie of weie
he &yogh;eode ner and i&slong;ai&yogh; þare ligge&punctelev;
Man man and womman also
&YOGH;e þou&yogh;te he þis is mi wijf&punctelev;and &slong;um gering is icomen hire to
I&slong;eo wel nouþe þat þe ho&rrot;e&punctelev;is iwonet hereto
hu&ydot; ne schullen neuereft ete mete&punctelev;ne mo&rrot;e schame me do
he slou&yogh; is fader and is moder&punctelev;mid is swerde þere
And wende bi heom þat is wijf&punctelev;and hire ho&rrot;eling it were
Wel &slong;ofte he &yogh;eode out a&yogh;ein&punctelev; þo þis dede wa&slong; ido
And &yogh;eode him toward churche &punctelev;And tu&ydot;nde þe do&rrot;e to
A&slong;e he toward churche was&punctelev;his wijf hamward he mette
Louerd merci he þou&yogh;te hou is þis&punctelev;with gret wonder he ire grette
Dame he &slong;eide hou goth þis&punctelev;&yogh;wat do&slong;t þou nouþe here
ho liggez in o&rrot;e bedde athom&punctelev;
Man man and womman ifere
Asire quath þis guode leuedi&punctelev;wel glad mi&yogh;t þou beo
Ihered beo o&rrot;e louerde&slong; grace&punctelev;þat þov mo&slong;t þis da&ydot; i&slong;eo
Þi fader and þi moder it is&punctelev;þat wide þe habbez i&slong;ou&yogh;t
Ihered beo o&rrot;e louerde&slong; &slong;onde&punctelev;þat hidere heom hath ib&rrot;ou&yogh;t
Leoue sire hi&yogh;e þe hom&punctelev;þou &slong;chalt heom faire afonge
And make with heom Ioie ioie inou&yogh;&punctelev;me þinchez er wel longe
Nai certe&slong; quath þis Iulian þo&punctelev;&yogh;if þat it is &slong;o
Al mi bli&slong;&slong;e of þu&slong;&slong;e liue&punctelev;and mi Io&ydot;e is al ido
Alas þat ich habbe þus longe ileoued&punctelev;þat ine hadde er ibeo ded
habbe ich aslawe fader an Moder moder
&punctelev;louerd &yogh;wat mai beo mired
Alto &slong;oth me &slong;eide þat wilde be&slong;t&punctelev;alas þulke &slong;tounde
Þei ich habbe ifolewed his bihe&slong;te&punctelev;þe soþe ich habbe ifounde
haue nouþe dame wel guod da&ydot;&punctelev;fo&rrot; inelle habbe no re&slong;te
Er ich habbe mine penaunce ido&punctelev; god God leue me don mi be&slong;te
A&slong;ire merci &slong;eide is wijf&punctelev;&yogh;warefo&rrot;e &slong;ei&slong;tþou so
Sikerliche þou &slong;cha ⁁lt at hom bileue&punctelev;and þine penaunce do
beo &slong;tille dame Iulian &slong;eide&punctelev;þou &slong;pext al embe nou&yogh;t
certe&slong; Inelle inelle neuere a&slong;tunte&punctelev;are ich me habbe of londe ib&rrot;ou&yogh;t
Ake haue guod dai mi treowe &slong;pou&slong;e&punctelev;and god God þe leue wel do
led clene lijf and bide fo&rrot; me&punctelev;fo&rrot; Ine wene neuere come þe to
Alas &slong;eide þis guode wijf&punctelev;&slong;ire &yogh;wi &slong;ei&slong;tþou so
&YOGH;if god God wole þe &yogh;w&ydot;le we aliue beoth&punctelev;ne &slong;chulle we departi atwo
bote þou wolle biþenche þe bet&punctelev;And at hom bileue here
Certe&slong; &yogh;wodere þou euere iwen&slong;t&punctelev;ichulle beo þi fere
And parti with þe of þi wo&punctelev;a&slong;e ich dude er of þi blis
Fo&slong; ho&slong;o deth þat on he &slong;chal þat oþur&punctelev;þou wo&slong;t wel þat ri&yogh;t it is
Þ
Is is guode Man man and is trewe wijf &punctelev;wel &slong;tille fo&rrot;th heo iwende
And leten lond and leode&punctelev;and al þat god God heom &slong;ende
So þat heo wenden feo&rrot; and longue&punctelev;þat atþe la&slong;te heo come
to a deop watur and perilous&punctelev;þare Men men ad&rrot;einten ilome
Þis guode Men men a⁁d&rrot;einten þer &punctelev;and leten heom &slong;one arere ⁁a&slong;tynte
Alu&ydot;tel housbote hit was guod inou&yogh;&punctelev;bi&slong;ide þe watere þere
Alle Men men þat þarefo&rrot;th come&punctelev;And withoute hebo&rrot;ewe were
he fond heom herebo&rrot;ewe guod inou&yogh; &punctelev;þat withoute none nere
bed and cloþe&slong; guode inowe&punctelev;and wel a&ydot;&slong;iliche heom di&yogh;te
heo&rrot;e fet he wuch&slong; and baþede heom&punctelev;and duden al þat heo mi&yogh;te
Fo&rrot; is fader &slong;oule and fo&rrot; is moder&punctelev;he dude al þis dede
he bad alle þat to him come&punctelev;þat fo&rrot; heo&rrot;e &slong;oulene hu&ydot; bede
he po&rrot;ueide him of a schip&punctelev;and ouer þe watere ladde
euerch t&ydot;me, dai&yogh; and n&ydot;&yogh;t&punctelev;alle þat to him gradde
Þarewith he swo⁁nk &slong;o&rrot;e inou&yogh;&punctelev;of noman ne tok he nou&yogh;t
&YOGH;wane he hadde ani mi&slong;ei&slong;e man &punctelev;ouer þe watere ibrou&yogh;t
he ne let him nou&yogh;t fram him gon&punctelev;are hu&ydot; amendede were
he ladde heom into is hou&slong;e anon&punctelev;and ai&slong;ede heom &slong;wiþe wel þere
Al heo duden fo&rrot;to bete þe &slong;unne&punctelev;of þat ca&slong; þat him bitidde
Fo&rrot; is fader &slong;oule and is Moder moder
&punctelev;and bad fo&rrot; heom bidde
Þarefo&rrot;e Men men &yogh;eot to þis da&ydot;&punctelev;þat ouer lond doth iwende
heo biddeth to seint Iulian fa&slong;te&punctelev;þat he guod ·In· Iuliani heom &slong;ende
And seint Iulianes paterno&slong;ter&punctelev;ofte heo &slong;eggez al&slong;o
Fo&rrot; is fader &slong;oule and is Moder moder
&punctelev;þat he b&rrot;ingue heom þarto
Þo þis holie Man man seint Iulian &punctelev;in þis trauail hadden ibeo longe
And mani Miseise Man miseise man in is hou&slong;&punctelev;wel loueliche vnderfonge
Ada&ydot; a&slong;e he hadde ibeo&punctelev;in trauaile &slong;trong inou&yogh;
A&slong;e ladde þis men ouer&punctelev;and into is Inne inne heom d&rrot;ou&yogh;
And a&yogh;ein middel n&ydot;&yogh;t to is bed&punctelev;&yogh;eode atþen ende
Fo&rrot;to habbe &slong;um re&slong;te þere&punctelev;&yogh;if o&rrot;e louerd it wolde h&edotbl;i&odotbl;m &slong;ende
Atþe midn&ydot;&yogh;t a&slong;e he bigan&punctelev;&slong;umdel re&slong;te afongue
A&yogh;eond half þe watere þare cam on &punctelev;in grete fo&rrot;&slong;te and &slong;trongue
Aris Iulian anon he gradde&punctelev;hiderward þou mo&slong;t go
And b&rrot;ingue me ouer þis watere &slong;one&punctelev;oþur ich dei&yogh;e fo&rrot; wo
Þis guode man heo&rrot;de &slong;one þis&punctelev;and þei he weri were
he wende to þis &slong;eli man&punctelev;and ladde him ouer þere
him þou&yogh;te þat he wa&slong; onneþe aliue&punctelev;for he wa&slong; al ouercome
Mid chele and mid oþur wo&punctelev;is lime&slong; him weren binome
lodlich mu&slong;el he þou&yogh;te al&slong;o&punctelev;and þe foule&slong;te þat mi&yogh;te beo
A
Miseisio&rrot;e miseisiore man þane he þou&yogh;te&punctelev;no man ne mi&yogh;te i&slong;eo
Seint Iuliane ladde þis &slong;eli man&punctelev;Into is hou&slong;e bi ni&yogh;te
And fondede to maken him anAy&slong;e&punctelev;bi al is trewe mi&yogh;te
gret fu&ydot;r he dude him makien and guod&punctelev;þat he were of chele ib&rrot;ou&yogh;t
And leide þarebi wel &slong;ofte&punctelev;ake al it wa&slong; fo&rrot; nou&yogh;t
Ake þo he ne mi&yogh;te with fu&ydot;&rrot;e him hete&punctelev;ne with none oþur ginne,
his owene bed he let faire &slong;p&rrot;eden&punctelev;and b&rrot;ou&yogh;te him þare
Inne inne
cloþe&slong; inowe opon him he &slong;p&rrot;adde&punctelev;and holede him wel fas&slong;te
&YOGH;eot he þou&yogh;te ful &slong;o&rrot;e of cale&punctelev;for al þat he on him ca&slong;te
Sw&ydot;þe so&rrot;i wa&slong; was þis guode man&punctelev;and &slong;ore him aga&slong;te
Þo he him dude al þat he mi&yogh;te&punctelev;and þe chele &slong;o longe ila&slong;te
he &slong;tod and biheold þis &slong;elie man&punctelev;a
Musel musel a&slong;e he wende
Sone &slong;o o&rrot;e louerd it wolde&punctelev;is hev&yogh; bigan amende
Atþe la&slong;te he werth &slong;o fair a man&punctelev;a&slong;e euere an&ydot; mi&yogh;te beo
And &slong;o cler he bicam &slong;one&punctelev;þat vnneþes men mi&yogh;ten him &slong;eo
Iulian he &slong;eide god God it þe &yogh;elde&punctelev;þat þou me ha&slong;t ido
In o&rrot;e louerde&slong; erinde of heuene&punctelev;icome ich am þe to
Ore louerd þe &slong;ente wo&rrot;d bi me&punctelev;þat þou art clanliche i&slong;ch&rrot;iue
And þine penaunce ha&slong;t wel ido&punctelev;and þine &slong;unne&slong; beoth fo&rrot;&yogh;iue
·b― And boþe &yogh;e &slong;chullen with alle Io&ydot;e&punctelev;newene come him to
·A―Sw&ydot;þe wel þou him ha&slong;t ipaid&punctelev;þou and þi wijf also
Þo he hadde þis wo&slong;d i&slong;eid&punctelev;he nu&slong;te &yogh;ware he bicam
Þis guode man seint Iulian&punctelev;to gode&slong; Godes &slong;eruis&slong; him nam
And to his bihofþe him makede al&yogh;are&punctelev;he and is wijf also
Sone afterward in his &slong;erui&slong;e&punctelev;heo deiden boþeto
And wenden to þe bli&slong;&slong;e of heuene&punctelev;þare heo &slong;chullen euere beo
guod it is to herebo&rrot;ewi Mi&slong;ei&slong;e miseise
me&combmacr; men
&punctelev;bi heom þat men mowen i&slong;eo
Fo&rrot; þarewith þis holie man&punctelev;his &slong;unne&slong; bette inou&yogh;
And a gret haluwe in heouene he is&punctelev;þei he fader and moder a&slong;lou&yogh;
bidde we &yogh;eo&rrot;ne sein Iulian&punctelev;þat he o&rrot;e erinde beode
Þat o&rrot;e louerd us &yogh;iue milce and o&rrot;e&punctelev;and alle þat habbez neode
Þat &yogh;wanne we oþur an&ydot; c&combcurl;&slong;tine Cristine man&punctelev;ouer lond &slong;chullen wende
Fo&rrot; is fader &slong;oule and is moder&punctelev;þat he guod herebo&rrot;ewe us &slong;ende
And atþe la&slong;te þo&rrot;u&yogh; gode&slong; Godes wille&punctelev;þat we moten teo
Into þe bli&slong;&slong;e of heuene&punctelev;and þare withouten ende beo
